Package model.players

Class GamePlayer

java.lang.Object
model.players.GamePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<GamePlayer>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Goalkeeper, Striker
public abstract class GamePlayer extends Object implements Comparable<GamePlayer>
This is an abstract class that implements Comparable to get final score and represents players (goal keeper and player) of the game.
